instruction: Patient seeks guidance about long-term effects of atorvastatin and possible additional lifestyle measures to reduce cardiovascular risk.

attributes.comment: Discuss long-term effects of atorvastatin and additional lifestyle measures to reduce cardiovascular risk

instruction: Atorvastatin – currently taking for dyslipidemia/cardiovascular risk reduction (dose not specified).

attributes.sig: Currently taking for dyslipidemia and cardiovascular risk reduction; dose not specified.

instruction: Patient on atorvastatin without muscle pain; reports slight increase in fatigue after cycling last week; concerned about long-term statin effects; father had a heart attack; no other new symptoms.

attributes.narrative: Patient taking atorvastatin with no muscle pain; noted slightly increased fatigue after cycling last week; expresses concern about long-term statin effects; reports that father experienced a heart attack; denies any other new symptoms.

instruction: Advised patient to reduce dietary saturated fats and increase fiber intake to augment lipid control.

attributes.comment: Advised patient to reduce dietary saturated fats and increase fiber intake to augment lipid control.

instruction: Patient to monitor for muscle aches or unusual fatigue while on atorvastatin and contact clinic if symptoms persist; potential liver enzyme check will be considered at that time.

attributes.comment: Monitor for muscle aches or unusual fatigue while taking atorvastatin and contact the clinic if symptoms persist; a liver enzyme check may be considered at that time.
